tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE racquet_inventory (
   inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   brand_id INT,
   size VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   quantity INT NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES racquet_brands(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InventoryManage (
    inventory_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id UUID,
    size_id UUID,
    quantity_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES RacquetBrand(brand_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (size_id) REFERENCES RacquetSize(size_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (quantity_id) REFERENCES RacquetQuantity(quantity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE racquet_brands (
  brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE racquet_sizes (
  size_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  size_value VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_details (
  inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  racquet_id INT REFERENCES racquet_brands(brand_id),
  size_id INT REFERENCES racquet_sizes(size_id),
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  order_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE order_items (
  order_item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id INT REFERENCES orders(order_id),
  inventory_id INT REFERENCES inventory_details(inventory_id),
  quantity INT
)
